Definition at line 14 of file IComponentEnvironmentManager.h.

Member Function Documentation

virtual QString icomp::IComponentEnvironmentManager::GetConfigFilePath ( ) const
pure virtual

Get file path of real used config file.

If no config file was used, it returns empty string.

Implemented in ipackage::CPackagesLoaderComp, and icomp::CEnvironmentManagerBase.
